text: NON-FUZZY CHECKPOINTS The DBMS halts everything when it takes a checkpoint to ensure a consistent snapshot: — Halt the start of any new txns. — Wait until all active txns finish executing. — Flushes dirty pages on disk. This is obviously bad... — SZCHU-DB Ï 4 » PI % 39:21/1:18:06 - NON-FUZZY CHECKPOINTS > 8 « J I e e - 21- ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
